Проведение спортивных соревнований на по: Conducting sports competitions for obtaining the high title of champion.
Спортивное соревнование по игровым видам: A sports competition in game sports with a large number of participants.
Состязание среди спортсменов или команд: Competition among athletes or teams of athletes in various sports.
Спортивные соревнования между командами: Sports competitions between teams or individual participants, which are held for both children and adults.
О чем обязаны позаботиться организаторы: What should the organizers of the championship take care of?
Подбор подходящей площадки в зависимости: Selection of a suitable venue depending on the specifics and scale of the event
Клининговое обслуживание и базовая подго: Cleaning service and basic preparation of the facility for the event
Разработка и производство сувенирной, по: Development and production of souvenir, printing and advertising products
Работа с волонтерами и администраторами: Working with volunteers and event administrators
Организация проживания гостей и участник: Organization of accommodation for guests and participants
Координация безопасности во время провед: Coordination of security during the championship
Организация охраны и противопожарной про: Organization of security and fire prevention
Обеспечение мобильной и радиосвязи на об: Provision of mobile and radio communications at the facility
Организация фото и видеосъемки, прямой т: Organization of photo and video shooting, live broadcast
И это далеко не весь перечень обязанност: And this is not the whole list of duties assigned to the organizer of the championship. At the same time, it is important to understand that in order to implement all of the above points, it is necessary to attract specialist contractors and monitor the performance of each of them.
Организация и проведение спортивных турн: The organization and holding of sports tournaments is one of the main directions of our work. Sports tournaments are one of the most effective forms of organizing mass wellness, physical culture and sports work in a series of corporate events.
«Готовый проект» — от аренды поля до цер: "Ready-made project" — from field rental to the award ceremony: Rental and preparation of the best sports grounds, professional sports equipment, competition regulations and tournament tables, detailed statistics, high-quality photo and video reports, colorful opening and closing ceremonies, entertainment program, professional and objective judging, buffet line, valuable gifts, cups, medals and diplomas. Every employee of the company can take part in competitions and tournaments, which means that the company can reach the maximum audience, attracting them to sports and promoting a healthy lifestyle among employees. The company implements social responsibility to its employees and their family members by organizing various mass sports events. Our company can offer tournaments in football, volleyball, hockey, cross-country skiing, table tennis, chess and other sports.
Организация и проведение спортивных меро: The organization and holding of sports events is a complex composite service. So, as part of the organization of a sports event, it is necessary to find a place for the competition, based on the convenience of the location, the number of participants in the tournament, as well as pick up audio and audio equipment, find a host, provide meals to athletes in accordance with the norms, as well as conduct audio, photo and video recording for the report and analysis of the sports event.
Соревнования по спортивным играм проводя: Competitions in sports games are held in accordance with the plan of physical culture and recreation and sports events or the competition calendar plan. Mass sports competitions allow solving pedagogical, sports-methodical and socio-social tasks. During the competition, the same pedagogical tasks are solved as in physical education and sports in general, i.e. improving physical, technical, tactical, mental and theoretical preparedness.
Правила соревнований определяют общую ор: The competition rules determine the general organization of competitions in a game sport: types of competitions and the system of their conduct; features of the equipment of the competition venues, inventory; the composition of the judging panel and their duties; rules of judging; rules for participants and other conditions specific to this game sport.
Соревнования - яркое, эмоциональное зрел: Competitions are a bright, emotional spectacle. The pleasure of sports spectacles arises from the participation of the spectator in them, who is attracted by the high level of development of motor qualities, bold and decisive actions of the participants, their high achievements.
Положение о соревнованиях определяет усл: The Competition Regulations define the conditions for a particular competition. It is developed by the organization that conducts or is assigned to conduct this competition. The situation should be brought to the attention of physical culture collectives and sports organizations in a timely manner.
Спартакиада - это спортивные соревновани: The Spartakiad is a sports competition and competitions between teams or individual participants, which are held for both children and adults.
Организация спартакиад требует профессио: The organization of sports contests requires a professional approach and consideration of all the features and nuances. For example, it is important to immediately identify the target audience - its age, gender, characteristics, scope of activity, goals and objectives. After all, the specifics of organizing children's sports events are significantly different from the Spartakiad for adults, especially when it comes to conducting cooperative sports events. Holding a sports contest for the organization is a fairly common type of corporate events. The corporate sprtakiad will become a bright holiday in the corporate life of employees, brighten up workdays and allow motivating the team for further active collaboration.
В большинстве случаев спартакиада включа: In most cases, the sports contest includes competitions in the most common sports. It can be football, volleyball, rugby, basketball, skiing, hockey, etc. To summarize and evaluate the results of the games, professional judges of a high category are attracted. The identified winners receive various awards - medals, certificates, diplomas, etc.
